name: Slimebo (PenguinWifDevPants)
description: The game is not a full game yet and is only up for very early feedback so I can make sure the game is polished before it is a fully finished game. There are only 2 levels right now and Updates come frequently. leave any feedback or suggestions in the comments. This is my first 2d game and my first actual playable game with levels and Story so bear with me.
